summary: Service Tickets Frontend & Backend Integration Testing - All 17 tests passed (100%). Verified unified Service Tickets system with 7-state workflow. Frontend loads correctly at /admin/service-requests with stats, filters, create modal, and ticket details. Old ticketing routes return 404 as expected.
passed_tests: Service Tickets - List tickets with pagination
Service Tickets - Get statistics (Total, Open, Closed, Urgent)
Service Tickets - Get all 7 statuses (new, assigned, in_progress, pending_parts, completed, closed, cancelled)
Ticket Lifecycle - Verify status history contains all transitions
Ticket CRUD - Get ticket by ID with visits and parts
